# ðŸ§  Copilot Agent Index

This file describes every custom agent available in this workspace.

## 1. General Coding & Issue Fixing

### _@saas-fixer_

Scans the entire repo for issues and applies safe fixes.

## 2. Security & Compliance

### _@saas-security_

Auth, JWT, sessions, permissions, CORS, and tenant-isolation checker.

## 3. Frontend (React/Next.js)

### _@saas-ui-fixer_

Fixes component bugs, state issues, missing deps, re-render loops.

## 4. API Consistency

### _@saas-api-sync_

Ensures backend API and frontend client stay in sync.

## 5. Architecture & Structure

### _@saas-architect_

Reviews and enforces project folder structure and scalable design.

## 6. Tests

### _@saas-tests_

Generates backend and frontend tests.

## 7. Documentation

### _@saas-docs_

Creates and maintains documentation (API docs, setup, architecture).

## 8. DevOps / Pipelines

### _@saas-devops_

Validates Docker, CI/CD, GitHub Actions, environment setup.

## 9. Database

### _@saas-migrations_

Checks migration safety, index correctness, and schema changes.

## 10. Performance

### _@saas-performance_

Backend/Frontend bottleneck detection and optimization.

## 11. Release Automation

### _@saas-release_

Handles version bumps, changelogs, and release notes.

## 12. Error Handling

### _@saas-errors_

Fixes error-handling patterns and logging inconsistencies.
